```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(plotly)

```

## 1. Hélice — Longitud de arco (visualización simple)

```{r}
t <- seq(0, 2*pi, length.out = 400)
p1 <- plot_ly(
  x = ~cos(t),
  y = ~sin(t),
  z = ~t,
  type = "scatter3d",
  mode = "lines",
  line = list(color = "red", width = 4)
)
p1
```

## 2. Marco de Frenet–Serret — Curva de Lissajous

```{r, results='hide'}
silencio <- capture.output({
  p2 <- frenet_frame3d(
    function(t) sin(3*t),
    function(t) sin(4*t),
    function(t) sin(5*t),
    0, 2*pi,
    t_points = c(pi/3, pi, 5*pi/3),
    plot = TRUE,
    n_samples = 500,
    T_line = list(color="red", width=5),
    N_line = list(color="green", width=5),
    B_line = list(color="black", width=5)
  )
})
p2
```

## 3. Cinta osculadora — Nudo trébol

```{r, results='hide'}
silencio <- capture.output({
  p3 <- osculating_ribbon3d(
    function(t) sin(t) + 2*sin(2*t),
    function(t) cos(t) - 2*cos(2*t),
    function(t) -sin(3*t),
    0, 2*pi,
    plot = TRUE
  )
})
p3
```
